Landscape¶

The landscape module¶

This module provides classes implementing landscape types for the Island.

class biosim.landscape.Landscape(population)[source]¶

Parent class for all landscape types.

Initializes class with given population. Creates instances of correct species for all elements in population list, and adds the instances to correct population list.

Parameters:population (list) – Contains dictionaries containing information about each animal
classmethod GET_DEFAULT_PARAMS()[source]¶

Returns a copy of the default landscape parameters.

Returns:Copy of default landscape parameters
Return type:dict
add_newborn_animals()[source]¶

Iterates over both population lists in turn, and makes all animals procreate utilizing their inherent birth process method. Adds a new class instance to population lists for each animal that is born.

available_fodder_carnivore()[source]¶

Returns amount of fodder available to carnivore. That is, the total weight of the herbivores in the cell.

Returns:Amount of fodder available to a carnivore.
Return type:float
available_fodder_herbivore()[source]¶

Returns amount of fodder available to an herbivore. If plenty of fodder is available in the cell, enough fodder will be returned to fullfill it’s appetite F. If not, what’s left will be returned.

Returns:Amount of fodder available to an herbivore.
Return type:float
feed_all_carnivores()[source]¶

Sorts carnivore population in the cell. Then, iterates over the carnivores and feeds them all, using their inherent eating method.

feed_all_herbivores()[source]¶

Iterates over the population of herbivores and feeds all animals, utilizing the eating method inherent to the animal instance.

make_all_animals_lose_weight()[source]¶

Iterates over population lists and makes all animals lose weight utilizing their inherent weight loss method.

make_all_animals_older()[source]¶

Iterates over population lists and ages all animals one year utilizing their inherent aging method.

regrowth()[source]¶

Sets amount of fodder for herbivores to maximum.

remove_all_dead_animals()[source]¶

Iterates over population lists and runs inherent death method on all animals. Updates the population lists to only contain living animals.

remove_all_eaten_herbivores(eaten_herbivores)[source]¶

Removes herbivores that have been eaten from the herbivore population of the cell.

Parameters:eaten_herbivores (list) – Herbivore instances that have been eaten during feeding of a carnivore.
classmethod reset_params()[source]¶

Sets the landscape parameters equal to default.

sort_carn_population_by_fitness()[source]¶

Sorts carnivore population by fitness, from highest to lowest. Uses lambda sorting.

sort_herb_population_by_fitness()[source]¶

Sorts herbivore population by fitness, from highest to lowest. Uses lambda sorting.

class biosim.landscape.Jungle(population)[source]¶

Class for Jungle landscape type.

Initializes class.

class biosim.landscape.Savannah(population)[source]¶

Class for Savannah landscape type.

Initializes class. :param population: list of dicts

List of properties of the initial population of animals
regrowth()[source]¶

Sets amount of fodder for herbivores to the value given by formula (1).

class biosim.landscape.Desert(population)[source]¶

Class for Desert landscape type.

Initializes class. :param population: list of dicts

List of properties of the initial population of animals
class biosim.landscape.Ocean(population)[source]¶

Class for Ocean landscape type.

Initializes class. :param population: list of dicts

List of properties of the initial population of animals. Should be empty.
class biosim.landscape.Mountain(population)[source]¶

Class for Mountain landscape type.

Initializes class. :param population: list of dicts

List of properties of the initial population of animals. Should be empty.
